thread.title: Big Switch 1 Games Coming to Switch 2 With Improved Performance and New Content
thread.title_full: Big Switch 1 Games Coming to Switch 2 With Improved Performance and New Content

author: Dalton Cooper
title: Big Switch 1 Games Coming to Switch 2 With Improved Performance and New Content
text:
Nintendo has announced that select Switch 1 games will receive enhanced versions on the Switch 2, but players will need to pay for the upgrades. While the new console is expected to improve performance for older titles, Nintendo is also rolling out official Switch 2 Editions of certain games, available as standalone physical releases or as upgrade packs for existing owners. Pricing for these upgrades has yet to be revealed.
Major Switch 1 Games Are Coming to Switch 2 With Improved Performance and Added Content
